name: TBP_sketch_004.gif
description: animated gif, 30 sec, 60fps, recorded on PICO8; sketch source code: https://github.com/atomoton/ThreeBodyProblem/blob/a76e34e59502e03a57091a3848631c3fced43eae/WIP/chaos_theory.p8 ; The Three Body Problem is the task of predicting accurately the positions and speeds of three orbiting bodies. The equations that govern this are deterministic, yet the task is impossible, and small errors feed back and lead to total unpredictability.
